title: Getting started
text: PCS codes composed seven alphanumeric characters. character contains 34 possible values. seven characters make complete code specific meanings vary 17 sections manual. value represents specific option general character definition. 10 digits (0-9) 24 letters (-H, J-N, P-Z) may used character. letters O used avoid confusion digits 0 1.

title: Getting started
text: character axis classification specifies information procedure performed. Within defined code range, character specifies type information axis classification. example, fifth axis classification specifies Approach sections 0 4 7 9 system.
code: pcs("0016070") #> # A tibble: 7 Ã— 6 #>   axis  name        code  label                                     table row    #>   <chr> <chr>       <chr> <chr>                                     <chr> <list> #> 1 1     Section     0     Medical and Surgical                      001   <int>  #> 2 2     Body System 0     Central Nervous System and Cranial Nerves 001   <int>  #> 3 3     Operation   1     Bypass                                    001   <int>  #> 4 4     Body Part   6     Cerebral Ventricle                        001   <int>  #> 5 5     Approach    0     Open                                      001   <int>  #> 6 6     Device      7     Autologous Tissue Substitute              001   <int>  #> 7 7     Qualifier   0     Nasopharynx                               001   <int>

title: Getting started
code: systems() |> select(sys.axis = name, sys.code = code, sys.label = label) |> rowwise() |> mutate(code = splitter(sys.code)[1]) |> ungroup() |> left_join(sections(), by = join_by(code)) |> select(axis = name, code, label, sys.axis, sys.code, sys.label) |> select(section = label, code = sys.code, system = sys.label) |> gt(groupname_col = "section", rowname_col = "system") |> opt_table_font(font = google_font(name = "Rubik")) |> cols_align(align = "center", columns = code) |> cols_label(code = "") |> tab_style(style = list(cell_fill(color = "lightgray", alpha = 0.5), cell_text(weight = "bold")), locations = cells_body(columns = code)) |> opt_all_caps(locations = c("row_group")) |> opt_align_table_header(align = "left") |> tab_header(title = html("ICD-10-PCS 2024")) |> tab_options( column_labels.hidden = TRUE, heading.title.font.size = px(22), table.font.size = px(14), column_labels.border.bottom.width = px(0), column_labels.border.top.width = px(0), row_group.font.size = px(16), )

title: Getting started
code: tables() |>    mutate(n = purrr::map_dbl(codes, nrow)) |>    arrange(desc(n)) #> # A tibble: 895 Ã— 6 #>    section system table description                             codes          n #>    <chr>   <chr>  <chr> <chr>                                   <list>     <dbl> #>  1 0       04     041   Medical and Surgical, Lower Arteries, â€¦ <spc_tbl_>  1540 #>  2 0       04     047   Medical and Surgical, Lower Arteries, â€¦ <spc_tbl_>  1116 #>  3 3       3E     3E0   Administration, Physiological Systems â€¦ <spc_tbl_>  1056 #>  4 0       0D     0D1   Medical and Surgical, Gastrointestinalâ€¦ <spc_tbl_>  1045 #>  5 0       03     037   Medical and Surgical, Upper Arteries, â€¦ <spc_tbl_>   888 #>  6 0       0R     0RW   Medical and Surgical, Upper Joints, Reâ€¦ <spc_tbl_>   864 #>  7 0       02     021   Medical and Surgical, Heart and Great â€¦ <spc_tbl_>   848 #>  8 0       0R     0RP   Medical and Surgical, Upper Joints, Reâ€¦ <spc_tbl_>   743 #>  9 0       0S     0SW   Medical and Surgical, Lower Joints, Reâ€¦ <spc_tbl_>   710 #> 10 0       03     031   Medical and Surgical, Upper Arteries, â€¦ <spc_tbl_>   666 #> # â„¹ 885 more rows prp <- procedural:::prep("0016") prp #> $split #> [1] "0" "0" "1" "6" #>  #> $section #> [1] "0" #>  #> $system #> [1] "00" #>  #> $table #> [1] "001" #>  #> $row #> [1] "0016" prp$section <- sections(prp$section)[c('code', 'label')] prp$system <- systems(prp$system)[c('code', 'label')] prp$table <- tables(prp$table)[c('table', 'description', 'codes')] prp$row <- rows(prp$row)[c('row', 'axis_title', 'axis_code', 'axis_label')] prp #> $split #> [1] "0" "0" "1" "6" #>  #> $section #> # A tibble: 1 Ã— 2 #>   code  label                #>   <chr> <chr>                #> 1 0     Medical and Surgical #>  #> $system #> # A tibble: 1 Ã— 2 #>   code  label                                     #>   <chr> <chr>                                     #> 1 00    Central Nervous System and Cranial Nerves #>  #> $table #> # A tibble: 1 Ã— 3 #>   table description                                                   codes      #>   <chr> <chr>                                                         <list>     #> 1 001   Medical and Surgical, Central Nervous System and Cranial Nerâ€¦ <spc_tbl_> #>  #> $row #> # A tibble: 24 Ã— 4 #>    row   axis_title axis_code axis_label                      #>    <chr> <chr>      <chr>     <chr>                           #>  1 0016  Body Part  6         Cerebral Ventricle              #>  2 0016  Approach   0         Open                            #>  3 0016  Approach   3         Percutaneous                    #>  4 0016  Approach   4         Percutaneous Endoscopic         #>  5 0016  Device     7         Autologous Tissue Substitute    #>  6 0016  Device     J         Synthetic Substitute            #>  7 0016  Device     K         Nonautologous Tissue Substitute #>  8 0016  Qualifier  0         Nasopharynx                     #>  9 0016  Qualifier  1         Mastoid Sinus                   #> 10 0016  Qualifier  2         Atrium                          #> # â„¹ 14 more rows

title: Getting started
code: definitions() |>    summarise(n = n(),              .by = c(code, section, axis, axis_name)) #> # A tibble: 29 Ã— 5 #>    code  section              axis  axis_name     n #>    <chr> <chr>                <chr> <chr>     <int> #>  1 0     Medical and Surgical 3     Operation    31 #>  2 0     Medical and Surgical 6     Device      433 #>  3 0     Medical and Surgical 5     Approach      7 #>  4 1     Obstetrics           3     Operation    12 #>  5 1     Obstetrics           5     Approach      6 #>  6 2     Placement            3     Operation     7 #>  7 2     Placement            5     Approach      1 #>  8 3     Administration       3     Operation     3 #>  9 3     Administration       5     Approach      6 #> 10 3     Administration       6     Substance    35 #> # â„¹ 19 more rows

title: Getting started
code:
pcs("0016070") |> gt(rowname_col = "axis") |> opt_table_font(font = google_font(name = "Rubik")) |> cols_align(align = "center", columns = c(axis, code)) |> tab_style(style = list(cell_fill(color = "lightgray", alpha = 0.5), cell_text(weight = "bold")), locations = cells_body(columns = code)) |> opt_all_caps() |> tab_header(title = html("ICD-10-PCS 2024
"), subtitle = html("SECTION: 0 Medical and Surgical
SYSTEM: 0 Central Nervous System and Cranial Nerves
OPERATION: 1 Bypass

")) |> tab_options( heading.title.font.size = px(24), heading.subtitle.font.size = px(18), heading.align = "left", table.font.color = "#0B0B45" ) "#0B3D45" #> [1] "#0B3D45" "#3D0B45" #> [1] "#3D0B45" "#450B1C" #> [1] "#450B1C" "#452C0B" #> [1] "#452C0B" "#2C450B" #> [1] "#2C450B" "#0B451C" #> [1] "#0B451C" "#" #> [1] "#" "#" #> [1] "#" "#" #> [1] "#" definitions() |> dplyr::filter(code == '0', axis == '3', axis_code == '1') |> dplyr::select(definition, explanation, includes) |> unlist() #> definition #> "Altering the route of passage of the contents of a tubular body part" #> explanation #> "Rerouting contents of a body part to a downstream area of the normal route, to a similar route and body part, or to an abnormal route and dissimilar body part. Includes one or more anastomoses, with or without the use of a device" #> includes #> "Coronary artery bypass, colostomy formation" definitions() |> dplyr::filter(code == '0', axis == '5', label == 'Open') |> dplyr::pull(definition) #> [1] "Cutting through the skin or mucous membrane and any other body layers necessary to expose the site of the procedure" definitions() |> dplyr::filter(code == '0', axis == '6', label == 'Autologous Tissue Substitute') |> dplyr::pull(includes) #> [1] "Autograft" #> [2] "Cultured epidermal cell autograft" #> [3] "Epicel(R) cultured epidermal autograft"

title: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface
code: library(procedural)

title: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface
code: sections() #> # A tibble: 17 Ã— 4 #>     axis name    code  label                                                 #>    <int> <chr>   <chr> <chr>                                                 #>  1     1 Section 0     Medical and Surgical                                  #>  2     1 Section 1     Obstetrics                                            #>  3     1 Section 2     Placement                                             #>  4     1 Section 3     Administration                                        #>  5     1 Section 4     Measurement and Monitoring                            #>  6     1 Section 5     Extracorporeal or Systemic Assistance and Performance #>  7     1 Section 6     Extracorporeal or Systemic Therapies                  #>  8     1 Section 7     Osteopathic                                           #>  9     1 Section 8     Other Procedures                                      #> 10     1 Section 9     Chiropractic                                          #> 11     1 Section B     Imaging                                               #> 12     1 Section C     Nuclear Medicine                                      #> 13     1 Section D     Radiation Therapy                                     #> 14     1 Section F     Physical Rehabilitation and Diagnostic Audiology      #> 15     1 Section G     Mental Health                                         #> 16     1 Section H     Substance Abuse Treatment                             #> 17     1 Section X     New Technology

title: ICD-10-PCS Definitions â€” definitions
